info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 17 at 4:43PM MST until July 17 at 7:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff AZ
info.description:
FFWFGZ
The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... The White Sage Fire in... Coconino County in north central Arizona...
* Until 745 PM MST.
* At 443 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain over the White Sage Fire. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. The expected rainfall rate is 0.5 to 1 inch in 1 hour. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the White Sage Fire.
SOURCE...Radar indicated.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the White Sage Fire.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Le Fevre Overlook, Jacob Lake, Condor Viewing Site and Vermilion Cliffs National Monument.
This includes U.S. Highway 89A between mile markers 570 and 595.
This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... House Rock Wash, Rock Canyon, Johnson Wash, Coyote Wash, Wildcat Canyon, Jacob Canyon, Kaibab Wash and Warm Springs Canyon.
info.instruction:
This is a life threatening situation. Heavy rainfall will cause extensive and severe flash flooding of creeks...streams...and ditches in the White Sage Fire. Severe debris flows can also be anticipated across roads. Roads and driveways may be washed away in places. If you encounter flood waters...climb to safety.
Avoid recently burned areas and downstream locations. Life-threatening flooding of creeks, roads, and normally dry washes will occur. Rockslides and mudslides will likely occur in steep terrain.
Remain alert for flooding even in locations not receiving rain. Normally dry washes, slot canyons, and creeks can become raging killer currents in a matter of minutes, even from distant rainfall.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 7:45 PM MST. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 7:45 PM MST. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 7:45 PM MST. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 7:45 PM MST. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
